authProviderWithModal.title: Edit provider: {name}

elementsGuidedTourStep.title: Add elements to your page
elementsGuidedTourStep.content: Every app needs components! Add elements like tables, forms, buttons, and more to bring your app to life.

dataGuidedTourStep.title: Connect your data
dataGuidedTourStep.content: Link your Baserow tables here to display, filter, and update your data dynamically across different elements.

previewGuidedTourStep.title: Your control center
previewGuidedTourStep.content: This is where you configure your app’s pages. Add elements, preview the result, and structure your app exactly how you want.

devicesGuidedTourStep.title: Preview on different devices
devicesGuidedTourStep.content: Switch between desktop, tablet, and mobile previews to see how your app looks on different screen sizes. Make sure your design works perfectly across all devices!

sidePanelGuidedTourStep.title: Side Panel: Customize Elements
sidePanelGuidedTourStep.content:
**General Tab** – Configure the selected element.

**Style Tab** – Customize padding, margin, borders, and more.

**Visibility Tab** – Control who can see this element: logged-in users, logged-out users, or specific roles.

**Events Tab** – If the element supports actions, configure them here for dynamic interactivity.

previewPublishGuidedTourStep.title: Preview & Publish Your App
previewPublishGuidedTourStep.content: Click **Preview** to test your app privately. When ready, click **Publish** to share it with the public via a domain.
